pr_title: KAFKA-10068: verify assignment performance with large cluster

timeline.message: refactor, add several tests with different parameters
review comments, un-parametrize the tests for individual limits

timeline.bodyText: Huh, I thought we fixed this a while ago. Why it it showing up in the diff right now?
timeline.author: vvcephei

replies.bodyText: I don't know about fixing this before, but I found this while debugging these tests and fixed it on the side in this PR. To be fair, it wasn't hurting anything since we happen to put the right thing in the taskLagTotals map, but the warning logged was definitely incorrect.
replies.author: ableegoldman

timeline.bodyText: Why remove this? Do we need to instantiate this class now? (I only see static members still).
timeline.author: vvcephei

replies.bodyText:
Do we need to instantiate this class now

No...isn't that exactly the reason we don't need this?
replies.author: ableegoldman

replies.bodyText: Ah, note the private. The purpose of this constructor is to make it uninstantiable. I.e., it's "self-documenting" that it should only be a container for static members.
replies.author: vvcephei

replies.bodyText: Ah yeah ok. I'll put it back
replies.author: ableegoldman
